programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: Customs Frontline
programme.desc: After boarding an unauthorized cargo ship and finding its entire crew dead, the Hong Kong Customs officers uncover a hidden cache of illegal weapons linked to an international conflict. As Customs officer Zhou Zheng Li and Interpols Ying go undercover, they unveil a multinational operation with ties closer to home.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Once in a Blue Moon
programme.desc: Mei Zhens family appears to get along but harbours deep secrets. Mei Zhen is trapped in a dead-end job with a toxic boss, her brother hides his separation and their mother grapples with lingering guilt over her husbands departure years ago. As Mid-Autumn Festival approaches, can the family heal their wounds and find a way back to each other?

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boys dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wangs which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan, actor Cheung Chau Wan, gynecologist Fu Mo Sum, feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung, and dance coach Charlie Lam - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu, who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Once in a Blue Moon
programme.desc: Mei Zhens family appears to get along but harbours deep secrets. Mei Zhen is trapped in a dead-end job with a toxic boss, her brother hides his separation and their mother grapples with lingering guilt over her husbands departure years ago. As Mid-Autumn Festival approaches, can the family heal their wounds and find a way back to each other?

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other's parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents' first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk witnesses a suspects murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Laus investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of Infernal Affairs are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: The story is about a super standard girl in school, May Who, is on a quest to win the love of a school senior heart-throbber, Fame, with her new-found friend, Pong. The only secret is that she can discharge electricity when she gets excited

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran, Wu Wei and an undercover cop, Tian Ming lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok. As they are about to leave after the rescue, Wu finds that his daughter is also kidnapped, and decides to stay on with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: To Live and Die in Mongkok
programme.desc: Fai (Nick Cheung), a legendary triad figure, was convicted and sent to prison for slaughtering a bunch of people. 30 years later, with the help of a social worker (Chan Lai Wan), Fai release from prison, the city of Mongkok has totally changed and he has almost forgotten his way back home. Disoriented and trapped in the notorious town of vices, Fai must find his way out of a life with a mother suffering from Alzheimer's disease (Paw Hee Ching), a hooker girlfriend (Mo Xiaoqi) with her mentally-challenged younger sister (Natalie Meng), and a malicious cop (Liu Kai Chi) hot on his tail.

programme.title: Limbo
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of brutal murders committed by a serial killer. Veteran detective Cham and rookie cop Will are assigned to the case. During the investigation, they encounter Wang Tao, who accidentally killed Cham's wife. Seeking redemption, Wang assists them in tracking down the killer, but her involvement puts her in grave danger.

programme.title: Imprisoned 2: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: Hong Kong businessman Yu and his secretary travel abroad for business meetings. When the secretary is killed in their hotel, Yu is arrested. Despite pleading not guilty, Yu is imprisoned in a cruel multinational prison where the warden enjoys torturing prisoners, and he must find a way to escape from this dark and deadly prison to survive.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a banks top executives use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the banks chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: Soul Mate
programme.desc: July and An Sheng have been best friends since they were thirteen. They always believed their friendship would last forever, until they meet Su Jia Ming at the age of eighteen. The trio find themselves in a love triangle, which puts the girls friendship to the test and alters their destinies.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their deaths. A fatal battle is about to begin

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Rivals Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: As Shen and Wong Fei Hungs relationship turns sour, Shen frames Wong and his disciple for murder. They are saved by a businessman Zhou, but Wong must win the Lion Dance Trophy to return Zhous favour. Can Wong Fei Hung defeat all skilled martial artists and complete his mission?

programme.title: The Bride From Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons Of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kungs brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Return Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studios highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: The Lovers Blades, a pair of invincible weapons, are to be delivered to the Qing Emperor. However, they accidentally fell into the hands of Xiao Zhong Hui and Yuan Guan Nan, so Imperial Chief Zhuo Tian Xiong hunts them down for the blades. As the battle begins, the secret of the blades are also revealed.

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu Hsin of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker. When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Judgement Of An Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Shaolins Hung falls in love with Fang while escaping the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hungs son creates a new form of martial art combining his parents kung fu styles.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobras blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his fathers old rival.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sings wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her masters Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fans daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fans friend along the way.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gamblers apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: The Duel Of The Century
programme.desc: A duel has been arranged at the Forbidden City between two formidable swordsmen of the martial world, Ye Gu Cheng and Xi Men Chui Xue. Lu Xiao Feng smells something fishy about the duel as the two swordsmen never met and do not have any conflicts. He decides to investigate more with Hua Man Lou, and eventually uncovers some hidden conspiracies

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Buddha'S Palm
programme.desc: Young Long Jian Fei, a martial arts novice, is adopted by the Fire Spirit Demon who taught him the powerful Buddha's Palm, turning Long into a martial arts master. Long is tasked by the Fire Spirit Demon to takes revenge for his master, and this soon unleashes a storm upon the martial arts world

programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.title: Wonders of the Human Body with Michael Mosley S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wonders of the Human Body with Michael Mosley - Michael demonstrates what stress does to our bodies.

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar - Journey across Madagascar, the oldest island on Earth. Over time, it has given rise to more unique plants and animals - from its famed lemurs to colourful chameleons - than any other island.

programme.title: Michael Portillo's Long Weekends S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Prague, Part 1 - Join Michael Portillo as he takes viewers on a long weekend to three of his favourite European cities of Madrid, Prague and Milan. Over these weekends, Michael reveals the secrets, sites and people that make these cities tick.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Kill or be Killed - In a world where enemies watch for weakness, our ancient powers must use all their strength and cunning to defend their people and conquer new lands. Who will rise to the challenge of the battlefield.

programme.title: Wonders of the Human Body with Michael Mosley S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wonders of the Human Body with Michael Mosley - Michael demonstrates what stress does to our bodies.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Queen of the Bay - Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Katis territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystals move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Risk and Reward - The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Desert-Adapted Elephant - Trek across the Namibian desert with the bush elephant and learn how it keeps its cool in a place with little food or shade. Discover how this giant consumes specific plants, digs wells, and hikes endless dunes in a quest to find precious water.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Saltwater Crocodile - Navigate a mangrove forest in Borneo with the saltwater crocodile, which is perfectly suited to life among the watery roots. Discover how this reptile uses the environment to regulate its temperature and why its epic patience makes it a super hunter.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Orangutan - Investigate the art of nest making with the jungles master builder: the orangutan. Shadow Max as he tries to escape the insect-filled floor of the Borneo rainforest and takes inspiration from this solitary primates natural engineering prowess.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Chimpanzee - Track chimpanzees through the Rwandan forest with Max, who tries to convince these powerful monkeys that hes a friend, not a foe. Pick up some key tips on jungle dining and witness complex family dynamics, including grooming and socializing.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Penguin Proposal - Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep2
programme.desc: House Hunting Hermit Crabs - Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Meerkat Survival School - Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Desert-Adapted Elephant - Trek across the Namibian desert with the bush elephant and learn how it keeps its cool in a place with little food or shade. Discover how this giant consumes specific plants, digs wells, and hikes endless dunes in a quest to find precious water.

programme.title: Nature Scenes S1 Ep54
programme.desc: Nashville Zoo Giraffe - One hour of uninterrupted baby giraffe grazing, playing, resting and cuddling with mom at Nashville Zoo in captivity

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep2
programme.desc: House Hunting Hermit Crabs - Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Meerkat Survival School - Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Sub Sahara - The latitudes south of the Sahara offer vastly different battlegrounds for a wide range of warriors. Male giraffes swing their heads like wrecking balls, zebras boast the most powerful kick in the animal kingdom, and chimpanzee warfare is eerily familiar.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Australia - Scan the Australian skies, which regularly deliver some of the worlds most volatile weather. Await cooling monsoon rains, watch lightning ignite vast wildfires, and marvel at the ingenious adaptations that help wildlife deal with these extremes.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep2
programme.desc: North America - Experience the powerful, colourful phenomena that swirl across the heavens in North America. Watch polar bears search for food under the aurora borealis, map the frigid path of a polar vortex, and elude violent tornadoes with a prairie dog family.

programme.title: Boss Shark
programme.desc: Witness the ultimate battle for dominance as scientists try to pick out the alpha male in a pack of 100-plus great white sharks off the New Zealand coast. Marvel at the speed, hunting prowess, and fearlessness that determine the leader of the pack.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beast Buddies - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Family - Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies and raising them is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mob Rules - The Eastern Grey kangaroo is a sociable species, clustering together in small groups known as mobs. A mob is a social network focused on feeding, where members will come and go as they please, depending on the availability of food.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Chemical Weapons - Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep3

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its preys heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mountains - Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Boreal - Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the brutal challenges of life in the boreal forest, then admire some stellar animal adaptations. Witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are gourmets at heart.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rebuilding an Empire - Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo S1 Ep2
programme.desc: From Pouch to Foot - Eastern Grey kangaroos are prolific breeders, but bringing up baby is fraught with challenges. Predators, climate extremes, and lively joeys mean kangaroo mothers face a daily struggle to keep their young alive.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Chico the Baby Capuchin - In Brazils Serra da Capivara, Chico, the baby capuchin monkey is learning to integrate into a troop with complicated rules, and exploring a forest full of excitement and danger. But mastering the art of tool use holds the key to his survival.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its preys heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jamie cooks three one-pan recipes that provide a perfect solution for busy life: a super-fast, flavour-packed smoky noodle soup; the cleverest homemade bread in a pan; and a chicken & mushroom pie with a time-saving tip for perfect pastry.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Should you meddle with a classic? Nigella thinks that in the case of her crab mac'n'cheese, it's a must. She also cooks up chocolate cookies, chicken with orzo and a rice-filled dessert.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home S8 Ep6
programme.desc: Didsbury and Streatham - George is in Manchester to drag an Arts and Crafts-inspired Edwardian home kicking and screaming into the modern day. And in London he meets Flo, a first-time buyer whose 1930s flat needs a rejig to make it the sociable space she's longing for.

programme.title: Grand Designs S22 Ep4
programme.desc: Newhaven Revisited - In 1999, Julia Brock and Tim Cox became the first couple to feature on the show, building a family home on the cliffs in Newhaven, East Sussex. Kevin McCloud revisits the Newhaven self build.

programme.title: The Great Home Transformation S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Series 1, Episode 5 - Emma and Nick head to Edinburgh to help artist Jade and musician Joe get to grips with small-space living in their two-bedroom flat. Can the team transform cramped chaos into a harmonious home?

programme.title: Grand Indian Hotel S1 Ep3
programme.desc: New Delhi - The exclusive Oberoi New Delhi opens a new concept restaurant. Can the hotel keep its 'old guard' customers happy and entice Delhi's new moneyed elite?

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Hidden Retreats - Some truly remarkable and hidden retreats in Canada, Iceland, Sweden and the UK.

programme.title: Jamie: Fast & Simple S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Jamie makes a Korean-inspired Gochujang chicken traybake, shows us eight ways to use salmon fillets, creates a spectacular quesadilla toastie and tops it all off with a no-cook, banoffee fro-yo tart.

programme.title: Hungry For It S1 Ep2
programme.desc: It's chicken week, and the cooks compete to get their marinades on Nando's menus in over 450 restaurants across the nation. But when service begins, one cook is missing in action.

programme.title: Grand Designs S22 Ep4
programme.desc: Newhaven Revisited - In 1999, Julia Brock and Tim Cox became the first couple to feature on the show, building a family home on the cliffs in Newhaven, East Sussex. Kevin McCloud revisits the Newhaven self build.

programme.desc: Demonic Pact - A girl unknowingly makes a demonic deal in an attempt to speak to her deceased father. And, a woman fights to free her daughter from Satan's grasp.

programme.title: Haunted Towns S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Fall River, Ma - The Tennessee Wraith Chasers investigate the site of one of America's greatest unsolved murders.

programme.title: Booze Traveler S4 Ep10
programme.desc: L'art De Booze - Jack consults a bronze pig for good luck, picks walnuts with a local witch, lifts a curse with brandy and finds a spot in the world's smallest bar.

programme.title: Airplane Repo S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Armed And Airborne - The million-dollar repo men face menacing mechanics, dangerous swamps and 6 armed cops in their attempts to seize luxury planes.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt S22 Ep11
programme.desc: On The Shores Of Saint Martin - A couple from Virginia look for a holiday home on the island where they got married. Can they find a property with rental potential in Saint Martin?

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt S22 Ep12
programme.desc: Happy Place In Myrtle Beach - A family from Wisconsin have holidayed in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, for years. Now, they are ready to buy a home near the beach and a golf course.

programme.title: Dead Of Night S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Last Call - Two young mothers living hundreds of miles apart vanish under eerily similar circumstances.

programme.title: Beyond The Unknown S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Woolly Mystery Lost Nazi Gold Train And The Plot T - Don Wildman investigates a toxic experiment gone wrong, recalls the hunt for a fabled train laden with Nazi gold

programme.title: Eli Roth Presents: The Legion Of Exorcists S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Demonic Pact - A girl unknowingly makes a demonic deal in an attempt to speak to her deceased father. And, a woman fights to free her daughter from Satan's grasp.

programme.title: Booze Traveler S4 Ep11
programme.desc: Czech Castles And Cocktails - Jack stumbles upon one of the oldest clocks in the world,drinks booze in a gingerbread shop and delves as deep as a dwarf in the Punkva caves.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt S22 Ep13
programme.desc: Celebrating With A Condo - A family from Minnesota have been visiting Florida for years. Now, to celebrate the husband turning 40 they want to buy a vacation home in Destin.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt S22 Ep1
programme.desc: From Houston Hustle To Surfside Beach Bustle - A couple from Houston want a beachside holiday home for their two children. Can they find the perfect property to create beautiful memories?

programme.title: Dead Of Night S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Panic Room - A young woman vanishes from her apartment in the middle of the night.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevins jokes. Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his comedians disease. Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;hell need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkles super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep31
programme.desc: Benny and The Jests - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Hollywood, USA - Glitch is not happy when he has to work with Kyan in a Hollywood film.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Fatberg, London Sewers, England - Glitch and the Grimbots create some enormous blockages after flushing wet wipes.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Whale Watching - Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Family Meeting - When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Faceytalk - Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Hidey Hup - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive to the Hidey Hup in the Tubby Car. They enjoy going on the Tubby Bouncy, the Tubby Uppy Downy, the Tubby Spinny and the Tubby Slidey.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Peekaboo - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing as they play Peekaboo.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep48
programme.desc: The Legend of the Golden Pencil - On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are learning about the seven wonders of Pop Paper City. But when they realise that one of the seven wonders has never been found, can Explorer Plom and friends find it?

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Dog Loves Small Adventure - Dog loses his voice and Pug has to read a book. Pug goes on an adventure with the bookshop mice. They enter the body of Dog and find his heart and his tummy.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bouncing Batwaves - Messy is having fun blowing loud notes through his musical horn instrument, but whatever noise Messy is making, someone or something is making it too. Messy goes in search of the copycat voice.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Cavity Cave - Messy brushes his teeth, but why must we use toothpaste and a toothbrush to get teeth clean? He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep74
programme.desc: Purple Zappa - Monty gets a new toy robot and wonders whether it is better to keep it shiny and clean in the box or to have fun playing with it.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep7
programme.desc: It's Time to Open a Caf - After visiting the park caf, JoJo and Gran Gran decide to make their own play caf in Gran Gran's garden. JoJo learns that running your own caf is really fun.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep6
programme.desc: It's Time to Visit the Market - JoJo and Gran Gran visit the busy market to buy fish and end up helping their friends. JoJo learns that the market is like a family - the people there are kind and look out for each other.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Balloon Barnacles - Sarah's hat goes on an adventure without her, on top of a balloon.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Basking Shark - Sarah is keen to adopt a sea creature, but doesn't get her first choice...

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep5
programme.desc: Crowning Around - Rajiv feels devastated when he loses his crown, thinking that it's the reason he is good at anything, but he soon learns that can still be really useful.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Claw - When Bluey and Bingo are unable to grab a prize on a Magic Claw machine, Mum and Dad create their own version at home. But Dad isn't about to make winning easy.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Markets - When Bluey visits the markets with five bucks from the tooth fairy, the options are endless. But as she and Indy look for the perfect purchase, spending it proves hard.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Blue Mountains - Bluey, Bingo, Mum and Dad play a game of hand puppets, exploring the land beyond the Blue Mountains where they outsmart the Cheeky Fox to find the softest ever beds.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Walkie Talkie - The veggies are playing walkie-talkie hide-and-seek, but Evil Pea steals Carrot's walkie-talkie and uses it to trick the Veggies into getting trapped by the Corn Cobs.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep35
programme.desc: The Music Video Badge - The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep36
programme.desc: The Exercise Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep37
programme.desc: The Dos and Don'ts Badge - The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Go Jetters Academy: Ghost Crabs - Glitch takes all the sand from the Academy beach, leaving the local crabs with nowhere to hide from hungry seagulls. Can the Go Jetters repair the beach before it's too late?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep21
programme.desc: The Salmon Run, Alaska - Alaska's a cool place to watch the salmon run, but Glitch opens a 'fishy taxi service' to help the salmon avoid tricky waterfalls and greedy bears. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Tomatina Festival, Buol, Spain - The Go Jetters get caught up in Spain's Tomatina Festival. The Tomato Battle takes place every August in the town of Bunol, near to Valencia.

programme.title: My World Kitchen S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Zahra-Rose's Somalian Nafaqo - Zahra-Rose's dish is Somalian nafaqo, made using mashed potato stuffed with boiled egg.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep4
programme.desc: River Chub - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to North America in search of a river chub that builds an underwater nest with over 7000 pebbles.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep19
programme.desc: Pirate Stickers - Sandy and Seaweed have started collecting "Famous Pirates and Crew of the World" stickers only to discover there's one last rare sticker to find.

programme.title: Panda and Krash S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Runaway Train - Krash discovers an abandoned toy train carriage in the corner of the room.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Tickle Crabs - When Dad brings a pair of tenacious tickle crabs home from the beach, nowhere in the house is safe! His only hope of escaping their tickles is with help from his true love.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Escape - When Mum and Dad describe a made-up world where they can relax without the girls, Bluey and Bingo decide to burst into their fantasy and chase them down. How will Mum and Dad escape?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Bus - During a game of bus, passenger Mum is too shy to tell bus driver Dad that she secretly loves him, until she gets some help from the Grannies.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep12
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep29
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Burns vs. Morales
programme.desc: Prelims - Perfect as a professional, Michael Morales is rapidly rising up the welterweight ladder, and on May 18, the 17-0 phenom will put his unbeaten record on the line when he faces his toughest test to date, perennial contender Gilbert Burns, in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a Performance of the Night knockout of Neil Magny, Ecuadors Morales now has his sights on Brazils Burns, a former world title challenger determined to score the win and get back in the championship chase at 170 pounds.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs. Figueiredo
programme.desc: Prelims - On May 4, the UFC Octagon sets down in Des Moines, Iowa for the first time for a UFC Fight Night card at Wells Fargo Arena featuring two elite bantamweights fighting for a place in the title conversation. A former flyweight champion looking for his fourth win since moving to 135 pounds, Deiveson Figueiredo is chasing a historic second divisional title, but to move closer to that goal, hell have to get by Cory Sandhagen, a fellow top five contender who owns wins over Frankie Edgar, Marlon Vera and Rob Font.

A former flyweight champion looking for his fourth win since moving to 135 pounds, Deiveson Figueiredo is chasing a historic second divisional title, but to move closer to that goal, hell have to get by Cory Sandhagen, a fellow top five contender who owns wins over Frankie Edgar, Marlon Vera and Rob Font.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Burns vs. Morales
programme.desc: Prelims - Perfect as a professional, Michael Morales is rapidly rising up the welterweight ladder, and on May 18, the 17-0 phenom will put his unbeaten record on the line when he faces his toughest test to date, perennial contender Gilbert Burns, in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a Performance of the Night knockout of Neil Magny, Ecuadors Morales now has his sights on Brazils Burns, a former world title challenger determined to score the win and get back in the championship chase at 170 pounds.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Burns vs. Morales

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC301PantojavsErceg
programme.desc: UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja returns home to Brazil to defend his crown for the second time against surging Australian contender Steve Erceg in the main event, and Hall-of-Fame legend Jose Aldo comes out of retirement to face rapidly rising phenom Jonathan Martinez. Plus, Anthony "Lionheart" Smith vs Vitor Petrino and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep12
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep29
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.desc: UFC 275 featured Czech MMA star Jiri Prochazka in his third Octagon outing as he sought UFC gold against newly minted light heavyweight champion, Glover Teixeira. Relive their fight with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.
